title: Inside the Parker - Yanks Lit, Miggy 500 Props, 7x All-Star Matt Holliday Talks NL West, NY Post Ken Davidoff on Bombers Tear
itunes:title: Inside the Parker - Yanks Lit, Miggy 500 Props, 7x All-Star Matt Holliday Talks NL West, NY Post Ken Davidoff on Bombers Tear
description:
This week on Inside the (Rob) Parker, Rob gives his take on the steamrolling Yankees steamrolling in the midst of an 11-game winning streak, his thoughts on Miguel Cabrera's 500th career home run, and his first impressions of the freshly released MLB postseason schedule, Also, Pocket Protector Stat of the Week, Foul or Fair, Betting on the Bases.

Guests: 7x All-Star Matt Holliday discusses the NL West race, if the Dodgers can ever catch the Giants, and offers his thoughts on Miguel Cabrera's 500th homer. NY Post Columnist Ken Davidoff breaks down the Yankees 11-game winning streak and

Click here to subscribe and download all of the latest Inside the Parker podcasts and follow Rob on Twitter!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
